summary: Citra follower with a small back story, my attempt at making lore for a future quest mod.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#666666][color=#d8d8d8]Citra Valentine -[/color]
[/color][color=#ff00ff]
[color=#c27ba0]This is a Follower and a RaceMenu Preset ~
Citra is on the run, she’s looking for someone in skyrim that might be the cause of what’s happening back home.
(More when you see her)[/color][/color]
[color=#ffff00]She is right in the sitting area of the cloud district in white run~[/color]
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/79842-3-1477811775.jpg[/img]


[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/79842-0-1477811608.jpg[/img]

[color=#ff00ff]Stats[/color]
Hight~0.8 Age~16 Voice~Female Young Eager Race~Wood Elf LV 85
Conjuratoion 90
Destruction 80
Restoration 80
Sneak 100

[color=#ff00ff]Spells[/color]
IceSpear
Revenant
Ebonyflesh
Fasthealing - and avoid death~
ConjureDremoraLord
ConjureStormAtronach

Preset Requirements (Optional) ~
YMMP
eyesofamber
truebrows
A Sculpt file is included so you can import the preset on other races other than wood elf and avoid neck seams.

[color=#00ffff]Credits[/color]
YMMP Make up ~
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?]ApachiiHair[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50307/?]truebrows[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59192/?]Eyes of Amber[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61332/?]EmpyreanWarpaints[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59399/?]Crimson twilight armor[/url]
You for checking out my mod :)

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/25110739/?tb=mods&pUp=1]
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/25110739/?tb=mods&pUp=1]Checkout my other mods ~[/url]



[color=#ff0000]May your travels be cold and deadly[/color]
author: Delano
